MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G75 postcode area of East Kilbride. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:30am due to 3rd party damage to our underground cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:09am on Friday, 09 April 2021
